title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8135.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8135.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) CR 57 from CR
57A northerly to the intersection of Route 481 in the Towns of Schroeppel and

Volney, Village of Phoenix and City of Fulton; provided, however, that this
route will be restricted from use by tandem trailers. (b) Route 481 from the City of Fulton - Town
of Volney east boundary north through the City of Fulton, the Towns of Volney
and Scriba, and the City of Oswego to the intersection of Route 104. (c) CR 2A from Route 13 to the exit ramp on

Route 81 at CR 2 in the Town of Richland and the Village of Pulaski. (d) Route 13. Route 13 between I-81 (exit 36)
and the Oswego-Oneida county line in the Towns of Richland, Albion and

Williamston and the Villages of Pulaski and Altmar. (e) CR 2 from the exit of IR 81 southbound
lane to CR 2A in the Village of Pulaski. (f) Great Bear Road from Route 57 northerly
to the entrance of the Owens-Illinois truck terminal in the Town of Schroeppel
and the Town of Volney; provided, however, that this route will be restricted
from use by tandem trailers. (g) Route 104 between the Oswego-Cayuga county line and I-81 in the Towns of

Hannibal, Owego, Scriba, New Haven, Mexico and Parish, the City of Oswego, and
the Village of Mexico. (h) Route 3. Route 3 between Route 104 and CR 6 in the City of Fulton and the Towns of

Hannibal, Granby and Volney and the Village of Hannibal. (i) Route 48. Route 48 between the

Onondaga/Oswego county line and Route 3 in the City of Fulton. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8135.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
